EmailTemplate.name: Inquiry with MBO Partners (1314202284.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Inquiry with MBO Partners (1314202284.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Elliot,
My name is Nicolette Taylor and I am an Enrollment Manager with MBO Partners. I received the inquiry you placed in our system yesterday evening and wanted to follow up with you to answer any questions you have about the MBO Program and the services we provide. I have attached a link below to my time trade calendar for you to select a convenient time for you to speak.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners and I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Have a great day,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
